Projects

Swasar - Swift implementation for Phasar

I am working on extending Phasar, an LLVM-based static analysis framework developed by the Secure Software Engineering group at Paderborn University, to allow for running analysis on Swift apps.

Learn more

SWAN - A program analysis framework for Swift

During the summer of 2019, I will be working under the supervision of Dr. Karim Ali to continue the work on SWAN. I am working on Swasar on personal time parallel to this development on SWAN because I am interested in exploring other solutions for Swift program analysis.

Learn more

GIS software to assist surveyors in topological surveys

When I was surveying for Greentree Engineering, I found a large bottleneck in the topological surveying process. I lead a team of 4 developers (total), under the name Prairium, and we are working on a commercial software solution for this problem.

CloudCity - A city building game written for HackEd 2019

A small game almost entirely from scratch about population management and city building using openFrameworks written during HackED 2019.

Learn more

Prototype for the current GIS software for topological surveys being developed

I developed a prototype for resolving a bottleneck in topological surveying and used the software in the field, saving the company lots of time. I have used the survey on a few job-sites, including James Cameron’s pea processing facility, Verdient Foods, located in Vanscoy, SK.

CAT - Cluedo Assistant Tool

A tool that can log moves and keep track of clues. I was fed up with WPF, so I never ended up implementing an MCTS for Cluedo, but the frontend is there.

Learn more

DoctorPlzSaveMe - a medical app developed for CMPUT 301 (Intro to Software Engineering)

I took the role of project lead and backend developer for this course project. This app allows users to record their medical issues, keep track of them, and receive feedback from a care provider.

Learn more

Starcraft 2 bot - a bot developed for CMPUT 350 (Advanced Game Programming)

We developed the bot on top of CommandCenter, and pitted it against other teams’ bots. I worked on siege tank and resource mining AI.

Learn more

Minor contribution to Frontline, an Arma 3 Mission Mod

I helped fix a couple of issues with the build. Frontline is an Arma 3 PVP mod, with a complex backend. It is an extremely unique mission in the Arma 3 modding community.

Learn more

Laser Tag Pistol

I 3D printed, built, and programmed a custom laser tag pistol. It used a Teensy for a micro-controller, produces various sounds, has LED animations, and can receive/send unique IR signals (to be able to differentiate between teams, for instance). I wanted to add more functionality, such as a vibration motor, but was limited by the number of timers the micro-controller had.

Learn more

Automatic deadbolt unlocker

I 3D printed, built, and programmed a remote-based automatic deadbolt unlocker for my dorm in my first year at university.

Learn more

Control panel for flight sims

I started making a control panel for Elite Dangerous (space flight sim game), but never finished it. WIP, mostly abandoned.

Daniil Tiganov, tiganov@ualberta.ca
